languages.text:
Psyber Raven has +15 Willpower
Enemies targeted by {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relayed{/g} Psy Powers must succeed at Agility test or gain {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g}.
If targets already have {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} they must pass Agi (+20) or become {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}Immobilized{/g}. Targets that are immune to Immobilize take 5% of their Max Wounds as Warp damage.

traits.locale_text:
Psyber Raven has +15 Willpower
Enemies targeted by {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relayed{/g} Psy Powers must succeed at Agility test or gain {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g}.
If targets already have {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} they must pass Agi (+20) or become {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}Immobilized{/g}. Targets that are immune to Immobilize take 5% of their Max Wounds as Warp damage.

languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
Псайберворон получает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Противники, на которых подействовала {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g}, выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g}.
Если такой противник уже замедлен, он совершает проверку Ловкости с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g}. Если у него иммунитет к обездвиживанию, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}, равный <u>5% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 Willpower.
The enemy affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power must pass an Agility resistance test or become slowed.
If that enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance test with a +20 bonus or become immobilised. Targets immune to immobilised suffer warp damage equal to <u>5% of maximum wounds</u>.

The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance test with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance test with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance test with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}Aktarılan{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücünün{/g} etkilediği düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlarlar{/g}.
Düşman zaten yavaşlamışsa +20 bonusa sahip bir Çeviklik direnç {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Felce bağışık hedefler, <u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %5'i</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalır.

The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.

If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

Ruhsiber kuzgun +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}Aktarılan{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücünün{/g} etkilediği düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlarlar{/g}.
Düşman zaten yavaşlamışsa +20 bonusa sahip bir Çeviklik direnç {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Felce bağışık hedefler, <u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %5'i</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalır.

Ruhsiber kuzgun +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}Aktarılan{/g} bir ruhsezi gücünün etkilediği düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde yavaşlarlar.
Düşman zaten yavaşlamışsa +20 bonusa sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olur. Felce bağışık hedefler, <u>maksimum sağlık puanının %5'i</u> kadar öteboyut hasarına maruz kalır.

languages.text:
El psicocuervo recibe +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Los enemigos afectados por un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitido{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizados{/g}.
Si el enemigo ya estaba ralentizado, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de Agilidad con una bonificación de +20 para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}. Los objetivos que son inmunes a la inmovilización sufren tanto {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} como un <u>5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
El psicocuervo recibe +15 de Voluntad.
Los enemigos afectados por un poder psíquico {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitido{/g} deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad para no quedar ralentizados.
Si el enemigo ya estaba ralentizado, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una bonificación de +20 para no quedar inmovilizado. Los objetivos que son inmunes a la inmovilización sufren tanto daño de disformidad como un <u>5 % de sus heridas máximas</u>.

El psicocuervo recibe +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Los enemigos afectados por un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitido{/g} deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizados{/g}.
Si el enemigo ya estaba ralentizado, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una bonificación de +20 para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}. Los objetivos que son inmunes a la inmovilización sufren tanto {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} como un <u>5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高15点。
受到{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入减速状态。
如果敌人已经处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，则需要进行敏捷抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态，若目标对{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果免疫，则改为受到{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}5%</u>。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
生化渡鸦的意志提高15点。
受到{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}灵能能力影响的敌人需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入减速状态。
如果敌人已经处于减速状态，则需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态，若目标对定身效果免疫，则改为受到亚空间伤害，等同于<u>最大生命值的5%</u>。

生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高15点。
受到{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入减速状态。
如果敌人已经处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，则需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态，若目标对{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果免疫，则改为受到{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}5%</u>。

languages.text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Von {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} betroffene Gegner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
Ist der Gegner bereits verlangsamt, muss er eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, sonst wird er {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Ziele, die gegen Lähmung immun sind, erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} in Höhe von <u>5 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +15 Willenskraft.
Von {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} psionischen Kräften betroffene Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, sonst werden sie verlangsamt.
Ist der Gegner bereits verlangsamt, muss er eine Widerstandsprobe mit einem Bonus von +20 auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, sonst wird er gelähmt. Ziele, die gegen Lähmung immun sind, erleiden Warp-Schaden in Höhe von <u>5 % der maximalen Wunden</u>.

Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Von {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} betroffene Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
Ist der Gegner bereits verlangsamt, muss er eine Widerstandsprobe mit einem Bonus von +20 auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, sonst wird er {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Ziele, die gegen Lähmung immun sind, erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} in Höhe von <u>5 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}</u>.

Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Von {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} betroffene Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
Ist der Gegner bereits verlangsamt, muss er eine Widerstandsprobe mit einem Bonus von +20 auf Beweglichkeit bestehen, sonst wird er {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Ziele, die gegen Lähmung immun sind, erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} in Höhe von <u>5 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +15.
Les ennemis affectés par un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
Si l'ennemi est déjà sous cet effet, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance d'Agilité avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}. Les cibles immunisées à l'effet Immobilisation subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} égaux à <u>5 % de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de Force mentale de +15.
Les ennemis affectés par un pouvoir psychique {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet Ralentissement.
Si l'ennemi est déjà sous cet effet, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet Immobilisation. Les cibles immunisées à l'effet Immobilisation subissent des dégâts du Warp égaux à <u>5 % de leurs blessures maximum</u>.

La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +15.
Les ennemis affectés par un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} doivent réussir un test de résistance d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
Si l'ennemi est déjà sous cet effet, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}. Les cibles immunisées à l'effet Immobilisation subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} égaux à <u>5 % de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}</u>.

La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +15.
Les ennemis affectés par un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} doivent réussir un test de résistance d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
Si l'ennemi est déjà sous cet effet, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}. Les cibles immunisées à l'effet Immobilisation subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} égaux à <u>5 % de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}は+15される。
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}の影響を受けた敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。
敵がすでにスロウな場合、+20のボーナスで敏捷性抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。移動不可に耐性のあるターゲットは、<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の5%</u>と同じ{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+15される。
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力の影響を受けた敵は、敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗するとスロウになる。
敵がすでにスロウな場合、+20のボーナスで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると移動不可になる。移動不可に耐性のあるターゲットは、<u>最大の傷の5%</u>と同じワープダメージを受ける。

サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+15される。
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力の影響を受けた敵は、敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗するとスロウになる。
敵がすでにスロウな場合、+20のボーナスで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると移動不可になる。移動不可に耐性のあるターゲットは、<u>最大の傷の5%</u>と同じワープダメージを受ける。

languages.text:
Псайберворон получает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Противники, на которых подействовала {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g}, выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g}.
Если такой противник уже замедлен, он совершает проверку Ловкости с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g}. Если у него иммунитет к обездвиживанию, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}, равный <u>5% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Enemies affected by a {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the enemy is already slowed, it must pass an Agility resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. Targets immune to immobilised suffer {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Псайберворон получает +15 к Воле.
Противники, на которых подействовала {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} психосила, выполняют проверку Ловкости на сопротивление и в случае провала оказываются замедлены.
Если такой противник уже замедлен, он совершает проверку Ловкости с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказываются обездвижен. Если у него иммунитет к обездвиживанию, он получает варп-урон, равный <u>5% от своего максимального здоровья</u>.

Псайберворон получает +15 к Воле.
Противники, на которых подействовала {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} психосила, выполняют проверку Ловкости на сопротивление и в случае провала оказываются замедлены.
Если такой противник уже замедлен, он совершает проверку Ловкости с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказываются обездвижен. Если у него иммунитет к обездвиживанию, он получает варп-урон, равный <u>5% от своего максимального здоровья</u>.
